Articles.Content: Im using this rocket and its not slowing down, not heating up or blowing up, F12 shows no aero indicators and parachutes dont work, did the atmosphere disappear?

It's a known issue with FAR Ferri. Unfortunately, what's not known is the cause of it. So far, information and reproduction steps are nothing more than 'I launched a few rockets and it broke'.

If you could nail down solid reproduction steps, as outlined in this sticky, ferram4 has an issue on Github you can contribute to.
